Michael Stack wrote:
> Do you think its because CVSGrab works with ViewCVS -- it seems to be
> looking for a ViewCVS identifier in the target page -- whereas SF has
> moved to ViewVC, the repository-agnostic recast of ViewCVS?

You're probably right.  Argh.

Frank
